intent_atoms.description: Hook the outline explorer to actual file import and streaming parse sessions so snapshots arrive from user-selected MP4 files.
Outline explorer must display snapshots that are generated from user-selected MP4 files via streaming parse sessions.
Extend outline filters to cover box categories and streaming metadata.
Outline filters should include options for box categories and streaming metadata as tracked by @todo #6.

functional_units.name: Tree View Virtualization & Search
functional_units.description: Provides a virtualized tree view of parsed data with search and severity filtering capabilities

functional_units.name: Combine-driven Outline View Model
functional_units.description: Manages outline data using Combine for reactive updates

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Explorer Surfaces
functional_units.description: Renders the explorer UI using SwiftUI, including virtualization via LazyVStack and severity toggles

functional_units.name: Parse State Badges
functional_units.description: Displays badges indicating the parse state of items in the tree view

functional_units.name: Preview Hierarchy Data Seeding
functional_units.description: Seeds preview data so the explorer can render without a live parse pipeline
